title: I keep receiving a message "IMPORTANT, You're using an older version of Android. (I'm on 11 Q)!
content: I'm just trying to get my Pixel 3 running 11 to be recognized for what it is when I seek help in the help pages and in the developers section. My phone is always noted as being an older version of Android but for whatever fix I'm seeking a newer version of Android is required Please check my Android version and update as necessary however obviously I am completely up to date using a Google Pixel 3 running Android 11 why is my device sometimes not even recognized as a mobile phone Rather it's recognized as a Chromebook or laptop running Windows which is insane can anyone explain this?
